Title: Reduces the number of signatures for designating and nominating petitions
Summary: Reduces the number of signatures for designating and nominating petitions to twenty-five percent of the number required by law, but not numbers in the New York city charter.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to reducing the numbers of signatures for designating and nominating petitions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
